requirement_text: The system shall allow users to create a new account using email and password
The system shall validate email format during signup
The system shall enforce a strong password policy (minimum 8 characters, mix of letters and numbers)
The system shall allow users to confirm their password at signup
The system shall notify users if the email is already registered
The system shall allow registered users to log in using their email and password
The system shall lock the account after 5 failed login attempts
The system shall display an error message for invalid login credentials
The system shall allow users to log out securely
The system shall support 'Remember Me' functionality for login
The system shall allow users to reset their password via email
The system shall provide a search bar on the homepage
The system shall allow users to search content by keywords
The system shall return search results within 2 seconds
The system shall display search results with relevance ranking
The system shall allow users to filter search results by category
The system shall allow users to view the most recent searches
The system shall provide autocomplete suggestions while typing in the search bar
The system shall highlight matching keywords in search results
The system shall display a message if no search results are found
